==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|あさ|めし|まえ}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あさめしまえ|朝飯|tr1=asameshi|t1=breakfast|前|tr2=mae|t2=before, ahead of}}. Literally meaning "before breakfast".

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/a̠sa̠ me̞ɕi ma̠e̞/|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|あさめしまえ}}

# {{lb|ja|idiomatic|sort=あさめしまえ}} A [[piece of cake]]; an extremely [[simple]] thing, something [[trivial]], a [[cinch]], [[easy as pie]].
#: {{ja-usex|そう、問題ないよ、こんなの'''朝飯前'''だ。|そう、 もんだい ない よ、 こんな の '''あさめしまえ''' だ。|Sure, no problem, it'll be a '''piece of cake'''.}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|お茶の子さいさい|おちゃ の こ さいさい}}: A [[piece of cake]].
